column4: I haven't used apt-cdrom, but I think maybe that if it's the install cd that you used to install ubuntu off, it's already added to the list of sources. So in theory apt-get should work. I could be wrong though
so it's already in the package list? can i install it manually through synaptic packages?
Sorry, I'm not sure about synaptic. I did it using apt-get from the command line.
What are you trying to install?
